a.title: SWSC Creates Police Department, Appoints Chief

nav.div: Southwest School Corporation Central Office » News and Community » In the News... » Extended Closure Update

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-align: center;

p.span: As directed by Governor Holcomb, Southwest School Corporation will extend its closure through May 1, 2020. Additionally, all state testing is cancelled for the remaining 2019-2020 school year.

Southwest School Corporation will continue its plan to extend Spring Break from March 20-April 3. Administrators are working diligently on an adjusted academic schedule for April 6-May 1. We appreciate your patience during this unprecedented time, and we value your continued support. We will continue to communicate as information is available surrounding this rapidly evolving situation. Parents and students will be notified of the adjusted schedule as soon as possible.
During the week of March 30th, meal pick up will be available from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. on the following dates. All pick-ups will be curbside:
Monday, March 30 (2 each, breakfast and lunch)
Wednesday, April 1 (2 each, breakfast and lunch)
Friday, April 3 (1 each, breakfast and lunch)
Additional food service dates will be available on the school website and Facebook.

span.span: . Only one meal per student per day is permitted.
Food pick-up will be available at the following door locations: SHS door #15, SES and SMS door #23, and Carlisle door #1.

SWSC is committed to the health and safety of our students and staff. We encourage you to continue to follow the recommended guidelines from the Centers for Disease Control regarding social distancing and other ways to help prevent the spread of illness. For more information, visit:

p.span: Again, thank you for your patience and support!

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
